name: SIDC Branch - Manila
description: Located in the heart of the capital, this branch serves as a central hub for urban members, providing modern solutions and support for a growing community of 5,000 members.

name: SIDC Branch - Cebu
description: Positioned in the vibrant Queen City of the South, this branch plays a key role in connecting businesses and individuals, fostering strong regional growth with 3,000 active members.

name: SIDC Branch - Davao
description: Nestled in one of Mindanao’s busiest economic centers, this branch supports agricultural and business communities, serving 2,000 members with essential services.

name: SIDC Branch - Batangas
description: As a major branch in Southern Luzon, this location caters to the province’s thriving agricultural and trade industries, helping 4,000 members expand their ventures.

name: SIDC Branch - Laguna
description: Strategically located in an industrial and agricultural hub, this branch assists 2,500 members with financial and business support tailored to local needs.

name: SIDC Branch - Quezon
description: This branch is deeply connected to the province’s strong farming and trading industries, supporting 1,800 members with resources for growth and sustainability.

name: SIDC Branch - Cavite
description: With its proximity to Metro Manila, this branch provides essential services to 3,500 members, focusing on both urban and rural business development.

name: SIDC Branch - Cagayan de Oro
description: Situated in a key gateway of Northern Mindanao, this branch aids 2,700 members with diverse opportunities in agriculture, trade, and commerce.
